queries.query: CREATE TABLE admin ( adminId varchar(10) PRIMARY KEY, userName varchar(20) NOT NULL, name varchar(25) NOT NULL, address varchar(25) NOT NULL, phoneNum varchar(10) NOT NULL, email varchar(15) NOT NULL, password varchar(20) NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE company ( companyId varchar(10) PRIMARY KEY, userName varchar(25), password varchar(25), location varchar(25), Type varchar(25), numberofemp varchar(25) );
INSERT INTO company(companyId, userName, password, location, Type, numberofemp) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
INSERT INTO admin (adminId, userName, name, address, phoneNum, email, password) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);

CREATE TABLE user ( userId varchar(10) PRIMARY KEY, userName varchar(25), firstName varchar(25), lastName varchar(25), gender varchar(25), address varchar(25), phoneNo varchar(25), email varchar(25), password varchar(25) );
INSERT INTO user(userId, userName, firstName, lastName, gender, address, phoneNo, email, password) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
SELECT * FROM user ORDER BY userId ASC;
CREATE TABLE booking ( bookingId varchar(10) PRIMARY KEY, userId varchar(25) NOT NULL, eventId varchar(25) NOT NULL, eventName varchar(25) NOT NULL, eventDescription varchar(100) );
INSERT INTO booking(bookingId, userId, eventId,eventName, eventDescription) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?);
SELECT * FROM booking WHERE userId = ? ORDER BY bookingId ASC;
SELECT * FROM booking WHERE bookingId = ? ORDER BY bookingId ASC;
CREATE TABLE events( eventId varchar(10) NOT NULL, eventName varchar(20), eventDate varchar(10), venue varchar(30), eventDescription varchar(500), budget double, PRIMARY KEY (eventId) );
